Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd between Cottage Grove-Ellis
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Ellis, 61st, Cottage & 63rd, due to police activity near 63rd between Cottage Grove-Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Ellis, 61st, Cottage then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to police activity near 63rd between Cottage Grove-Ellis

Allow extra travel time.
